CREATE PROCEDURE
DBO.USR_UM_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_UMHSREFERRALBATCH (@ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL OUTPUT, @REFERRALID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL, @UMHSID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER, @VALIDATEONLY BIT = 0, @CHANGEAGENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL, @REFERRERID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL, @REFERRERROLECODEID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL, @DEPARTMENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL, @SUBDEPARTMENTID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL, @FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED BIT = NULL, @FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE TINYINT = 0, @REFERRALDATE DATETIME = NULL, @UMHSDEVSTAFFID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL, @COMMENTS NVARCHAR(MAX)= '') AS SET NOCOUNT ON;
--SET @ID = @REFERRALID;
IF @REFERRALID IS NULL SET @ID = NEWID() else SET @ID = @REFERRALID
IF @CHANGEAGENTID IS NULL EXEC DBO.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID OUTPUT
DECLARE @CURRENTDATE DATETIME = GETDATE()
SET @UMHSID = (SELECT ID FROM USR_UMHS_DATA WHERE CONSTITUENTID = @UMHSID)
BEGIN TRY MERGE INTO DBO.USR_UMHS_REFERRAL AS TARGET USING ( VALUES ( @ID, @UMHSID, @REFERRERID, @REFERRERROLECODEID, @DEPARTMENTID, @SUBDEPARTMENTID, @FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED, @FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE, @REFERRALDATE, @UMHSDEVSTAFFID, @COMMENTS ) ) AS SOURCE ( ID, UMHSID, REFERRERID, REFERRERROLECODEID, DEPARTMENTID, SUBDEPARTMENTID, FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED, FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE, REFERRALDATE, UMHSDEVSTAFFID, COMMENTS) ON TARGET.ID = SOURCE.ID WHEN MATCHED THEN --EXEC DBO.USP_RAISE_ERROR UPDATE SET UMHSID = SOURCE.UMHSID, REFERRERID = SOURCE.REFERRERID, REFERRERROLECODEID = SOURCE.REFERRERROLECODEID, DEPARTMENTID = SOURCE.DEPARTMENTID, SUBDEPARTMENTID = SOURCE.SUBDEPARTMENTID, FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED = SOURCE.FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED, FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE = SOURCE.FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE, REFERRALDATE = SOURCE.REFERRALDATE, UMHSDEVSTAFFID = SOURCE.UMHSDEVSTAFFID, COMMENTS = SOURCE.COMMENTS, ADDEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID, DATEADDED = @CURRENTDATE, DATECHANGED = @CURRENTDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN -- handle inserting the data INSERT --INTO DBO.USR_UMHS_REFERRAL (ID, UMHSID, REFERRERID, REFERRERROLECODEID, DEPARTMENTID, SUBDEPARTMENTID, FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED, FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE, REFERRALDATE, UMHSDEVSTAFFID, COMMENTS, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) VALUES (SOURCE.ID, @UMHSID, SOURCE.REFERRERID, SOURCE.REFERRERROLECODEID, SOURCE.DEPARTMENTID, SOURCE.SUBDEPARTMENTID, SOURCE.FOLLOWUPCOMPLETED, SOURCE.FOLLOWUPSTATUSCODE, SOURCE.REFERRALDATE, SOURCE.UMHSDEVSTAFFID, SOURCE.COMMENTS, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE); END TRY BEGIN CATCH EXEC DBO.USP_RAISE_ERROR RETURN 1 END CATCH
RETURN 0
